Player History
Earned first career win on 4/14/1965...
Had first career hit on 4/18/1966, off Clyde Wright (BOS)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1966, going 6-0, 1.74...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1969, going 6-1, 1.82...
Injured on 6/2/1969 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for entire career...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Texas in 1972...
Traded from Texas to New York (N) on 5/26/1975 (Going to TEX: P B. Kingman, P T. Phoebus. Going to NYM: P J. Koosman)...
